TimeoutSequence Class Reference

Represents a sequence of timeouts, to be used for instance when sending packets to modules, the first timeout can be 1 second, the next 5 seconds etc. More...

Detailed Description

Represents a sequence of timeouts, to be used for instance when sending packets to modules, the first timeout can be 1 second, the next 5 seconds etc.

Currently only supports either a fixed timeout, or a sequence where the first timeout differs from the rest.
